sentences.en: All prisoners will awaIt'security personnel and maintain passive treatment.
sentences.cn: 所有犯人等候安全人员,并维修被损物.
我急切地等待你的批准.

sentences.en: I grew to await it with a nameless dread.
sentences.cn: 我心头发生了无名的恐怖,期待着.

sentences.en: I own myself an ass, and I await your orders.'
sentences.cn: 我承认我是头蠢驴, 现在一切听你指挥. ”

sentences.en: I shall await you at seven - thirty or thereabouts.
I shall await your answer to my letter with eagerness.

sentences.cn: 数不清的陷阱等待毫无戒心的投资者.

sentences.en: Several men are awaiting trial for robbery.
sentences.cn: 几个人因抢劫正在候审。

sentences.en: That's fine. I'll await his return call.
sentences.cn: 很好. 我会等他的来电.

sentences.en: They're being sent to Siena to await exchange.
sentences.cn: 他们正被遣送到锡耶纳去等候交换.

sentences.en: We await help from the Persians.
sentences.cn: 我们正等待着波斯的援兵.

sentences.en: We await the next volume of this superb edition with keen anticipation.
sentences.cn: 我们殷切期盼着这本精装版下一卷的面世。

sentences.en: We may await the decision of this long air battle with sober but increasing confidence.
sentences.cn: 我们可以怀着冷静的然而是日益增长的信心等待这一长期的空战结局.

trans.tran_cn: 等候； 期待； 将降临到…身上
